reference.shortdesc: A booklist indicates a list of items within the book.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The booklist element is a general purpose element, designed for use in specializations, that references a topic or map containing a list of items within the book. For example, it could be used to reference a topic that contains a list of authors for the book. When a more specific element is already available, such as tablelist for a list of tables, use that element instead.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The booklist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
